mapper.insert: insert into vehicle(vin, license, vehicleType, vehicleColor, clientId, createTime, updateTime) values (#{vin}, #{license}, #{vehicleType}, #{vehicleColor}, #{clientId}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select: select * from vehicle where clientId = #{clientId} and vin = #{vin}
mapper.update:

vehicleType = #{vehicleType},

clientId = #{clientId},
